Class Cloud

java.lang.Object
Cloud
public class Cloud extends Object
Cloud Service Class.

This starts the emulated cloud service, and the simulated clients. Two emulated "VM"s (actually processes) are started: one for the database, and one instance of the Server class. Additional VMs (that run the Server class) can be launced using startVM from ServerLib.

The main() in this class takes 4 or 5 command line parameters: port, DB_file, rand_spec, hour, and optional duration of experiment. port sepcifies the RMI registry port to use, rand_spec is the client arrival rate distribution (see handout), hour is the simulated time [0-24), and duration is the number of seconds to run the experiment.
